_sText: This is the Zarch's Island as you can see in the game Ishar 2 Messenger of Doom, Plus include the nav file for bots. This pretend to be a recreation of this island from the ms-dos graphics to source engine. The current update include an access to the roofs, other access for the culvert and an improved roof for the buildings. Works also for Gmod. Extract in : C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\user\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps
